EmailTemplate.description: Invitation to the Webinar Series about MyAerospace Portal Redesign
EmailTemplate.name: 2013 Webinars.MyAerospace Revamp - Invitation (Internal)
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace.com Redesign, Coming Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace.com Revamp Live Webinar {{system.date:default=edit me}} Coming Soon! We are updating the look and feel of the MyAerospace.com website. We've collected customer feedback and we are making major improvements to the site! Simplified navigation organized around common tasks
- Previously we had over 240 links in our navigation flyouts, now we have decreased it to just under 90 - Organized by customer workflow and tasks using human factors approach. - Created a separate website highlighting Honeywell Products and Services.
Personalize Your Home Page
- Quickly customize the tools you use the most.
Session Dates:
- Wednesday 16 October at 6:30 AM (PDT) - Thursday 17 October at 9:00 AM (PDT) - Thursday 17 October at 8:00 PM (PDT)
Presenter: Grant Humpherys <mailto:Grant.Humpherys@honeywell.com>, Honeywell Aerospace. Grant Humpherys, Customer Support Program Manager for E-Business, supporting Order Status deployment and major Portal Development. Duration: 30 Minutes Presentation and 20 Minutes Q&A ***This training is for Honeywell employees only. Do not forward outside of Honeywell.***
<http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospace-Revamp.html>
